related_questions.question:
This text is for questions 5-6    Sasha, sorry I can't come to your house to
night to do the Science project as we have
planned. My grandmother just came and she
wants me to accompany her to my aunt's
house. I will meet you at school tomorrow.
Erinda
__________________________
6. "... she wants me to accompany her...
The underlined word refers to...
A. Sasha's grandmother
B. Erinda's grandmother
C. My grandmother
D. My aunt
his text is for questions 7-8
ANNOUNCEMENT
​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

how do you read?

1. ask,

2. continue,

3. vote,

4. discuss,

5. search,

6. conclude,

7. don't be too fast

semoga membantu, jadi jawaban terbaik makasih ya

1.
2.
be-minded-close-don't-So
3.
young-she-woman-an-is-energetic
wer

answers.answer:

2. don't be so close minded

3. she is an energetic young woman

4. she has an outgoing personality
